Polki Diamond and Emerald Circular Pendant Haaram with Pearl Lockets

₹2,26,340

Description

This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a contemporary design. The use of Polki diamonds and emeralds signifies prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and modern attire.

Materials

  • 22K Gold
  • Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds)
  • Emerald Beads
  • Fresh Water Pearls. Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.

Features

This exquisite Haaram features a circular pendant adorned with Polki diamonds arranged in a floral pattern. The pendant is accented with vibrant green emeralds. A delicate pearl tassel hangs gracefully below, interspersed with emerald beads, completing the piece. The use of Polki diamonds lends a traditional, regal touch.
